servinfo.title: Hard starting (Engine cranks OK)
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:M16A and J20A and Engine Basic Inspection:M16A and J20A .

action.ptxt: Valves and Valve Guides Inspection:J20A or Valves and Valve Guides Inspection:M16A .
Valve Spring Inspection:J20A or Valve Spring Inspection:M16A

ps.ptxt: Compression leak at cylinder head gasket

action.ptxt: Cylinder Head Inspection:J20A or Cylinder Head Inspection:M16A
Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Inspection and Cleaning:J20A or Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection:M16A
Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Inspection and Cleaning:J20A or Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection:M16A

ps.ptxt: Camshaft position control (VVT) system out of order (for M16A engine)
